messages.content: Welcome to the Open Format Community! Let's help you find the right contribution.
First, tell me about your programming experience and skills.

message.content: I'm a JavaScript developer with 2 years of experience, mostly with React and Node.js

messages.content: Great! I can see you have merged code into other open-source projects like ElizaOS, HeroSpace & react.
Do you have any blockchain experience?

message.content: I have some experience with Ethereum and Solidity

messages.content: Based on your skills, I've found some more intermediate tasks you might be interested in.

tasks.title: Implement Cross-Chain Token Bridge Functionality
tasks.description: Develop a smart contract module for bridging ERC-20 tokens between Ethereum and Polygon networks with security optimizations

tasks.title: Enhance AI Agent's Contextual Memory Retrieval
tasks.description: Implement advanced embedding-based semantic search for improving RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) context window precision

messages.content: Excellent choice! Once you submit a pull request for the Implement Cross-Chain Token Bridge Functionality task, we'll review and reward you.
Great job! I've reviewed your pull request, looks good!. You've earned 250 USDC for your contribution. Thank you for your hard work!
Want to see some more tasks?
